content:
isaacvetter opened Issue #345:

Should re-insert something like this in the header:
!!! important Draft "Standard for Trial Use" (STU2) This is the draft of the 1.1 release of the FHIRcast specification. We are currently working towards a 1.1 release and would love your feedback and proposed changes. Look at our current issue list and get involved!

isaacvetter closed issue #345:

Should re-insert something like this in the header:
!!! important Draft "Standard for Trial Use" (STU2) This is the draft of the 1.1 release of the FHIRcast specification. We are currently working towards a 1.1 release and would love your feedback and proposed changes. Look at our current issue list and get involved!
